entries.entry: The data practice has been a struggle.  I understand that we use loops to look through the data, but pinpointing where to look in the practice exercise was a real challenge.
We learned how you can store data in JS and then run functions to display the data in the DOM with HTML.  I'm still a little fuzzy on the syntax.
We learned how to build our own API and store data on .JSON servers.  This looked pretty cool.  I'm excited to tap into external APIs soon.
Practice exercises take a long time to complete.
